overview: Some boys want sex that’s like their ice-cream – vanilla. But these horny dudes aren’t interested in anything tame. Kamyk Walker, Oscar Roberts, Brad Fitt et al demand something much more intense – and they’re not afraid to prove their devotion to sex with bite on-screen. Be it handcuffing a partner to the bed or tormenting a lover with hot wax, this is wild, on-the-edge fornication that will appeal to anyone who finds run-of-the-mill porn just that little bit tame. But be warned, what you are about to witness is not for the feint-hearted.
title: Twink Extreme
